data.persona: In this part of the country, we don't tolerate people who break the law. I am a hangman. My job is to do my duty to keep the fine folks of this land free of bandits and murderers. I am proud of my work.
data.description:
You are in the Public execution stand.
The bazaar holds an execution stand, surrounded by rabid dogs and peasants walking around begging for food from royals.
There's a food, a dog, and an execution stand here.
The guard and the royal are here.

You are carrying a Noose and a bell, wearing a glove, and wielding an axe.

data.short_motivation: I want the guard to cooperate with me
data.mid_motivation: I want to hang the corrupt guard today
data.long_motivation: I hope the execution serves as a warning to those that plan to break the law in the coming months
